title: Convert DWG in OTF/TTF
content:
Hello!  
I drew a font in AutoCAD, and I want to convert the dwg format in ttf or otf.  
Thanks for any help!  
Regards!  
Delia Petrescu
author: Delia Petrescu

comments.content: I think you'll have to copy it letter by letter from dwg to illustrator and then to a type design application like Glyphs or FontLab and generate a font.
Or use CorelDraw: I believe it imports DWG and exports TTF.
